actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Energy Department, State Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Garrison Diversion Project.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to implement the recommendations in the December 1984, report of the Garrison Diversion Unit Commission. Limits capital repayment assistance from power revenues to the irrigation features of the project.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Garrison Diversion Project.
